content:
I remember! You mentioned earlier that your last online order from Target was for household essentials, and the total amount you spent before the discount was $500.

Keep in mind that you might be able to earn rewards or cashback on this upcoming purchase, depending on your loyalty programs, credit cards, or cashback apps. Make sure to check your programs and apps to see if there are any opportunities to earn rewards or cashback on your Target purchase.

Also, consider using Target's loyalty program, Target RedCard, which offers 5% off on online purchases. If you have a RedCard, you can earn 5% off your online order, which can add up to significant savings over time.

Remember to track your rewards and cashback earnings to maximize your benefits. If you need help keeping track or have any questions, feel free to ask!
